posts.post_content: People keep leaving these strange EDH comments like "he can target himself with his ability and swing for a lot! wow!" I feel like that is what should be happening when you use Xenagos in Commander.

posts.post_content: Devotion for the two-color gods is easier to reach than for the monos, at least in two-color decks. Xenagod here is easily the best, narrowly beating out Mogis. How does devotion work with cards like [Burning-Tree Emissary](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Burning-Tree Emissary)? Does the emissary give 4 devotion to red and green or only 2?

posts.post_content:
4.5/5 stars  
Nice ability especially with access to fire-breathing and trample. One of the better Gods in the set. Just wish that he could target himself with his ability, the "another" part of the next prevents him from entering as a 12/5 indestructible creature with haste if you already have enough devotion.
